pr_title: DHFPROD-4670: Display disabled links for adding to flow for non-flow writer

timeline.message: DHFPROD-4670: Display disabled links for adding to flow for non-flow writer

timeline.bodyText: Can we verify this to be disabled instead to satisfy the requirement -- "Important: Unless you have this role, the "Add step to existing flow" and "Add step to new flow" options on the Curate and Load tiles should be disabled'
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: It checks by clicking the flow list and verifying that the flow name doesn't appear. Apparently ANT design doesn't use a standard select box, so I can't check with '.toBeDisabled()'.
replies.author: ryanjdew
